name: Batman The Stealth Game
description:
BATMAN THE STEALTH GAME

Batman The Stealth Game is a Fan Made. The game has been re-adapted to provide a more dynamic and more modern gameplay with the addition of stealth mechanics. The game is completely free.

*The game includes ten levels and the final battle with joker

* If you want you can leave a donation. Thanks and have fun

The game is compatible with Microsoft controller 360 / one

System requirements

CPU = intel dual core / quad / amd / x2 / x3 / x4 2.60 Ghz

4gb ram

video card = intel Hd 4400 Ati radeon 4670 512 mb / nvidia 9600 GT or higher

remember to install the dxwebsetup included in the package .
